articles.author: Sam Barberie
articles.description: Games developers are ignoring opportunities that are unique to Web3, according to industry veteran Sam Barberie.
articles.title: 3 Opportunities NFT Games Should Seize to Achieve Mass Adoption

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Coinbase has tapped major brands for its "Onchain Summer" event ahead of the Base mainnet launching on August 9.
articles.title: Coinbase Enlists Coca-Cola, Atari Ahead of Base Mainnet Launch Next Week

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Kristen Hecht brings 17 years of experience in financial crime compliance at a time when Binance is juggling a host of complaints.
articles.title: Binance Announces New Compliance and Money Laundering Reporting Officer

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Argent takes another step in making its crypto wallet disappear, rolling out a new web wallet that resembles your favorite web2 banking app.
articles.title: Argent Takes Key Step Towards 'Invisible Wallet' With Newest Web Wallet Launch

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The hack on one of the largest decentralized exchanges earlier this week has triggered a negative pullback across the DeFi sector.
articles.title: DeFi Blue-Chip Tokens Hit With Bearish Week Amid Curve Finance Hack

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: The drop comes amid Robinhood’s decision to discontinue support for certain tokens, which were identified as securities by the SEC.
articles.title: Robinhood Sees Crypto Trading Revenue Plummet 18% in Latest Earnings

articles.description: ASIC is taking eToro to court over "over the appropriateness of its target market for contract-for-difference" products.
articles.title: Australian Financial Watchdog Takes eToro to Court Over High-Risk Trading Products

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: Even with a star-studded launch and a recent Web3 pivot, the company shut down abruptly late Wednesday.
articles.title: Despite Name Brand NFT Deals, Nifty's Shuts Down

articles.description: The impossible became possible after a medical team performed a double neural bypass.
articles.title: Mind Over Paralysis: AI Helps Quadriplegic Man Move and Feel Again

articles.description: The company’s tech has already been used to flesh out NPCs in games like Skyrim and Grand Theft Auto V.
articles.title: AI Startup Inworld Raises $50M to Create Better Video Game Characters

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The IRS and the Treasury are coming up against a deadline, and Democrats have little patience left.
articles.title: Elizabeth Warren, Bernie Sanders Demand Crackdown on ‘Crypto Tax Evaders’

articles.description: The exchange’s agreement with USDC stablecoin issuer Circle has been a boon as interest rates march higher.
articles.title: How Coinbase Makes Money Has Shifted Since Its IPO

articles.description: The growth of AI could have a greater impact than the discovery of electricity or the arrival of personal computers.
articles.title: AI Investments Could Surge to $200 Billion Globally by 2025: Goldman Sachs

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Legislators at both state and federal levels are moving to protect people and jobs.
articles.title: New York Bill Would Protect Writers and Actors From Being Replaced by AI

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Prime subscribers can now snag a free Polygon NFT and in-game currency for Mojo Melee, with more freebies to come.
articles.title: Amazon Prime Is Giving Out Free NFTs for This Polygon Game

articles.description: Aurory is an NFT-driven game franchise that started life on Solana and is expanding to other chains. Decrypt's Jason Nelson spoke with Aurory Head of Marketing Michael Natoli at Solana's PlayGG event, where Natoli shared his thoughts on the challenges that blockchain games face in reaching players.
articles.title: 'Give Projects a Chance,' Says Aurory's Michael Natoli on NFT Game Challenges

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The first Ethereum futures ETF could be launched as soon as October 2023—that is, if the SEC approves it.
articles.title: These Are the High-Profile Ethereum Futures ETF Applications Currently in Play

articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: Bandai Namco Research and partners have rolled out a virtual pet game, joining other publishers like Ubisoft and Sega on the Oasys blockchain.
articles.title: Gaming Giant Bandai Namco Launches AI Virtual Pet NFT Game

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: So far, it isn’t looking too good for the Bitcoin fork which recently experienced resurgence.
articles.title: Litecoin Just Had Its Third Halving—Here's What That Means for LTC

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: In former East Berlin, Sam Altman’s Worldcoin is scanning irises for tokens—under the watchful eye of European privacy watchdogs.
articles.title: 'Show Your Face to the Orb': Eyes-on With Sam Altman's Worldcoin

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Bankman-Fried's defense fights back against the DOJ’s recent motion, saying it's based on “innuendo” and “assumptions.”
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried's Lawyers Say Basis for Revoking Bail Is 'Extremely Thin'

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Worldcoin faces further scrutiny over its iris-scanning project, despite over 2 million sign-ups worldwide.
articles.title: Kenya Suspends Worldcoin Operations Amid Privacy Concerns

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong has reiterated the crypto exchange’s intention to add support for Bitcoin’s Layer-2 scaling solution.
articles.title: Coinbase Mulling Best Ways to Integrate Lightning Network for Bitcoin

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: From supercomputer simulations to a kitchen recreation, the news has riled up the science community.
articles.title: Room-Temperature Superconductor Claim Sparks Excitement and Skepticism

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Days after Yuga Labs showcased fresh elements of its Otherside metaverse game, the Bored Ape-themed Ethereum token notched a new low.
articles.title: ApeCoin Price Sinks to All-Time Low as Bored Ape NFTs Dip Again

articles.author: Andrew Cohen
articles.description: Artist Mitchell F. Chan's Ethereum NFT game about statistical overload goes well beyond the baseball diamond.
articles.title: 'Moneyball' Meets Crypto in 'The Boys of Summer' Experimental NFT Game

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The company has returned to profitability after a modest rise in the price of Bitcoin.
articles.title: MicroStrategy Makes Profit, Reports $24 Million Bitcoin Impairment Charge in Q2

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Cybersecurity firm SlashNext sounds the alarm as exploits get much more sophisticated.
articles.title: Hackers Keep Finding New and Sophisticated Ways to Use AI for Crime

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The video game retailer's NFT push continues to crumble after it fired the CEO who oversaw its launch.
articles.title: GameStop Is Killing Its NFT Wallet and Blames ‘Regulatory Uncertainty’

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The co-founder of the collapsed firm said in documents that he became a permanent resident of Singapore years ago.
articles.title: Three Arrows Capital Co-Founder Kyle Davies Says He Doesn't Have to Answer to US Courts

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: With new chatbots and image editing tools, the social giant is gunning to rise again like a phoenix—with AI as the wind beneath its wings.
articles.title: Meta Bets Big on AI to Revive Facebook and Instagram

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The team behind Ordinals said its Bitcoin-based protocol's development will be supported by a nonprofit structure moving forward.
articles.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Team Launches Nonprofit as Inscriptions Top 21 Million

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Nvidia's new Perfusion image presonalization method takes 100KB of space and needs only 4 minutes of training to reproduce a concept.
articles.title: Nvidia AI Image Personalization Method Fits on a Floppy Disk and Takes 4 Minutes to Train

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: After selling CRV to a host of eager buyers, the Curve founder has repaid $9.2 million in Aave loans. But risks still abound.
articles.title: Justin Sun, DCF God and Others Line Up to Buy Curve Finance Founder’s CRV Tokens

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Term Labs took inspiration from the U.S. Treasury to build a platform that matches borrowers with lenders according to their preferred rates.
articles.title: Term Labs Launches Fixed-Rate Lending Protocol on Ethereum

articles.author: Paul Krantz
articles.description: The mining firm is launching three locations in South Carolina, with its CEO citing the state’s “abundance of clean electricity” for the move.
articles.title: Genesis Digital Assets Expands Bitcoin Mining Activity in ‘Pro-Innovation’ South Carolina

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: Worldcoin has introduced a concept called “proof of personhood" to keep AI bots out of its global financial network.
articles.title: What is Worldcoin? Sam Altman's Eye-Scanning Global ID 'Orb' Project Explained

articles.description: Solana Foundation General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Solana network will tackle the scaling problem that blockchain games pose for the industry.
articles.title: Solana Is Only Network Ready for Gaming: Solana Foundation's Johnny Lee

articles.description: Kyu Lee is the President of game studio Com2uS USA. In an interview, he shares the studio's approach to Web3 and crypto gaming with Decrypt GG's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Com2uS Is Going "Full Speed" on Crypto Gaming: Kyu Lee

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.
articles.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.
articles.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.
articles.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.
articles.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect

articles.description: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.
articles.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.
articles.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.
articles.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder

articles.description: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.
articles.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.
articles.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI

articles.description: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.
articles.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.
articles.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos

articles.description: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.
articles.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers

articles.description: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.
articles.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder

articles.description: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.
articles.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?

articles.description: Former Activision Vice President Michael Lee is now the SVP of Growth at Matter Labs. At the 3XP gaming conference, Lee sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss crypto gaming and give his predictions for the industry.
articles.title: Ex-Activision VP Michael Lee: Gaming Is Crypto's 'Killer App'
